sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect,useState} from "react"; import movies from "../movies" import { useParams,Link,Outlet } from "react-router-dom"; import Booking from "./Booking" function Details(){ const params=useParams() const userId=params.userId const obj=movies.find(function(num){ return num.title===userId }) const [movie,setmovieData]=useState([]) const [found,setNotFound]=useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?t=${obj.title}&y=${obj.year}&apikey=961ea94b`) .then((res) => res.json() ).then(data => setmovieData(data)) .catch((err) => { setNotFound(true); }) }, []) console.log(movie.Plot); return ( <>

{movie.Title}

{movie.imdbRating}/10

 {movie.imdbVotes} votes
  • {movie.Runtime}
  • {movie.Genre}

About the Movie

{movie.Plot}

) } export default Details;
